comments.body: Can you update the doc comment above as well to reflect that this is deprecated and link to the new thing that should be used?

It's not clear to me why this should ever return null. The two implementations of this look pretty non-nullable to me.

If it in fact returns null, we need to update the documentation to indicate what that means.
Same as below, why should this be allowed to return null? And what does that mean?

I've found one test that explicitly returns null but without this test I would have removed an if non-null on the result.
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/826b70466a8abdd600a876cee68f6ba968feae7d/packages/flutter_web_plugins/test/plugin_registry_test.dart#L55-L75
I read through it again, looks like this is actually ok to return null
